plays.text: Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Miikka Kiprusoff
Goal scored by Dallas Drake assisted by Doug Weight and Martin Rucinsky
Goal scored by Cory Stillman assisted by Petr Cajanek and Eric Boguniecki
Penalty to Scott Mellanby 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Hannan
Goal scored by Keith Tkachuk assisted by Pavol Demitra and Scott Mellanby
Goal scored by Marco Sturm assisted by Niko Dimitrakos and Alyn McCauley
Goal scored by Miroslav Zalesak assisted by Jonathan Cheechoo
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Mellanby
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Crosschecking Rob Davison
Penalty to Niko Dimitrakos 2 minutes for Roughing Barret Jackman
Penalty to Barret Jackman 2 minutes for Roughing Niko Dimitrakos
Penalty to Barret Jackman 2 minutes for Roughing Niko Dimitrakos served by Scott Mellanby
Penalty to Christian Laflamme 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Eric Boguniecki assisted by Petr Cajanek and Cory Stillman
